Danny Sullivan , editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com, said Google's`` probably overdue for a major management reorganization.'' The structures between the three have remained exactly the same over the past 10 years-- which might as well be 100 years of Internet time, he said in a blog post.`` It could be that Eric Schmidt wants a break from being the main public face of the company,'' he said. House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi , D-Calif., who stood by Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital bed when her left eye fluttered open. Her right eye was damaged and is still bandaged. Kirsten Gillibrand said the congresswomen were telling Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better. Gabrielle Giffords was gripping their hands, Kirsten Gillibrand said,`` and the more we joked about what we were going to do, she started to open her eyes.'' Debbie Wasserman Schultz said she
